content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule a plumbing appointment. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Erin! Can you please provide the address where you need plumbing service?
Great, thank you! To find the best plumber for you, could you briefly describe the plumbing issue?
My kitchen faucet is leaking and I think it needs to be replaced.
Thank you for the details! When would be a convenient time for our plumber to come by and take care of your leaky kitchen faucet?
I’m not ready to schedule yet. I want to get quotes from a few other companies first.
reason: Customer wants to get quotes from other companies before scheduling.

content: Absolutely, Erin. Feel free to reach out whenever you’re ready to book! If you have questions or need a price estimate, just let me know. Have a great day!
reason: Customer declined to schedule at this time.
